taskDescription: What products are formed from acid-catalyzed hydration of racemic (±)-4-methyl-1-hexene? What can you say about the relative amounts of the products? Is the product mixture optically active?
detailedSolution: An optically inactive, non-50 : 50 mixture of two racemic pairs: (2R,4R) + (2S,4S) and (2R,4S) + (2S,4R)
